blogPost.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
blogPost.body: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
blogPost.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett
blogPost.author: Younghwi Cho

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以来第一个游戏化的Defi协议，它向被称为HODLers的长期投资者支付奖金，使用未能Hodl的用户支付的惩罚性费用。
localize.tagline: 一种Defi协议，让你像巴菲特先生一样投资密码

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以來第一個遊戲化的Defi協議，它向被稱爲HODLers的長期投資者支付獎金，使用未能Hodl的用戶支付的懲罰性費用。
localize.tagline: 一種Defi協議，讓你像巴菲特先生一樣投資密碼
